_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five kinds of sensual stimulation [m: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Sounds known by the ear that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Smells known by the nose that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Tastes known by the tongue that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
The ascetics and brahmins who enjoy the: They are tied, infatuated, and attached
They are blind to the drawbacks
They do not understand the escape
They have met with calamity and disaster
They are vulnerable to the Wicked One
They haven’t met with calamity and disaster
They are not vulnerable to the Wicked One
The different stages of absorption (a ca: Dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
The qualities of a mendicant who has bli: They are quite secluded from sensual pleasures
They are secluded from unskillful qualities
They have entered and remained in the different stages of absorption
They have put out his eyes without a trace
They have gone where the Wicked One cannot see
They have crossed over clinging to the world
They walk, stand, sit, and lie down in confidence
